content: lily lemon peel scarf a long wrap around scarf in a lovely textured lemon peel stitch that uses just single and double_crochet and works up more quickly than you think materials <400g of an aran weight yarn recommend wi soft & smooth 6 5mm hook scissors and needle for finishing concentration level the stitches are simple but a mistake in the order can throw off the rest of the stitches so a little concentration is needed until you re in the rhythm stitches used us single_crochet - single_crochet pull up a loop yarn over and pull through both loops on the hook double_crochet double_crochet yarn over pull up a loop yarn over and pull through two loops on hook yarn over and pull through remaining two loops on hook other notes and tips stitch count is in brackets at the end of each round gauge 10 row of 10 stitches 5 single_crochet and 5 double_crochet = approx 3 x 3 inches
